name: Balancing Bears (kvvkn)
description:
It is a game about two bears that must fight to be the last to stand on a scale. To do this they must throw boxes to the area of the other bear so that part ends up sinking

It is a game created in Málaga Jam weekend 10 by Mário Fernández Calderón, Alejandro Cueto Jiménez, Luis Alarcón Arroyo and Juanma Pedrosa.

This game is done in 48 hours.
